item.title: News: Apple finally allows game emulators in the App Store
item.description: Finally gaming emulators are now permitted on Apple devices PlayStation, GameCube, Wii, and SEGA Emulator for iPhone and Apple TV Coming to App Store https://www.macrumors.com/2024/04/19/ps1-gamecube-wii-emulator-coming-to-app-store/ Further details about Apple allowing game emulators in the App Store https://www.macrumors.com/2024/04/17/what-to-know-about-iphone-app-store-emulators/
item.content:encoded:
Finally gaming emulators are now permitted on Apple devices

PlayStation, GameCube, Wii, and SEGA Emulator for iPhone and Apple TV Coming to App Store

  • https://www.macrumors.com/2024/04/19/ps1-gamecube-wii-emulator-coming-to-app-store/

Further details about Apple allowing game emulators in the App Store

  • https://www.macrumors.com/2024/04/17/what-to-know-about-iphone-app-store-emulators/
